comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: She seems to have identified the cause of citrus canker in 1915--a very big deal for the commercial citrus grower.

comment.author: 69005233@N00
comment._content:
Another U of Michigan graduate in the Bureau of Plant Industry (Florence Hedges was another).

In the University of Michigan yearbook from 1903, she is listed amongst the senior class:
Clara Henriette Hasse, Muskegon

Interesting tidbit:  The Washington Post, Dec 9, 1914:
Michigan Alumnae Musicale
The University of Michigan Alumnae will give a musicale and tea dance at the Cairo, December 14, 4 to 7 o'clock.  The committee in charge of arrangements are the Misses Angie Beckwith, Nellie Brown, Florence Hedges, Clara Hasse, Phoebe Howell, Karoline Klager, Ruth Greathouse, Clara Jamieson, and Ruth Rizer.

comment.author: 25053835@N03
comment._content:
Thank you Brenda and Penny for these additional glimpses into Ms. Hasse's life.

Susannah
Smithsonian Institution Archives

comment.author: 7633518@N08
comment._content: As a part of the recent women in science edit-a-thon held at the Smithsonian Institution Archives, an article was developed about Clara Hasse on Wikipedia! en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clara_H._Hasse
